content.detailedDescription: I looked into the distance and saw a orange dot fly up from the distance as it reached high up in the sky it hovered for around 4 minutes and it gradualy moved towards the right and a tiny white dot appeared and the orange dot came together and turned white then disappeared. i was walking home from playing football with my brother.  at first i thought it was some kind of flair untill it didnt disappear and it kept going up into the sky, it flew up really fast then stopped and veired right untill it turned white when it touched a white dot that appeared it disappeared. im quite scared and as soon as me and my brother saw it we ran home and told my mum and now im reporting it, it disappeared behind a cloud then i havnt seen it since.
content.summary: A small orange dot in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
about six or so years ago my dad, mom, and i were on our way home to sonora california at the base of the foothills of the sierra nevada's. my father is a tow truck driver so we were out pretty late. about one maybe two in the morning. ten minutes till sonora on hwy 108 we were coming up upon the yosemite' turnoff in this semi flat area when we noticed a big dark triangle cross the road. this object had no lights on but the outline and certain features were still visible. we never said a thing until it was gone. we were almost mezmerized. no recorded loss of time but its strange that we just stared at it and never said anything. the object was hover above the road as we drove. we got closer and though we were going to drive right into it and suddenly it disappeared into nowhere. after the object was gone we all agreed on what we saw. 

    today i saw a special on the history channel called ufo hunters that i watch about the same area in and around sonora california and the sierras called triangle ally. i was interested and suprised when i saw my hometown and lionsbald mountain. the i was amazed to see an artist rendering of what witnesses explained they saw and looked exactly what i saw. seeing this compelled me to report my sighting to mufon and hope to find more info on this areas high sighting rate. if you wish to see an sketch of what it looked like i can draw one or copy and paste a still frame of the rendering off of the show. please contact me and tell me more about triangle alley for i am very interested in ufo's and always have been since i was little. please send or reply to my primary email listed in the report, or call.
content.summary: Triangular. only saw back. crossed road into sonora while driving.

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing on the north side of our van, talking to some relatives through the passenger side window. i glanced over my left shoulder and i thought i saw a movement. sure enough, there was the tail end of a black ufo about 3-5,000 thousand feet above. (it looked like it was about three telephone poles high.) i could see about four people inside a window. they were dressed in black and they looked down in our direction. i saw about 3/4 of their figures in their ufo window. for some reason i did not get all excited and run around the building to get a better view. i just said, "hey, look at that!" i believe my wife's brother was the only one who looked in the direction of the ufo. whether he saw it or not, i don't know. (he is now diseased.) there was no sound and it was moving real slow. probably about 20 miles an hour. the ufo flew west. on the google earth location, it was 36 degrees 10' 02.44"n abd 108 degrees 20' 10.51" w and flying west.  later i was thinking what would a ufo be doing way out here in the middle of nowhere.
i don't know what the overall shape was because i did not run around the side of the building to get a better view. why not? i don't know.
content.summary: Black.

content.detailedDescription:
While in bed, @ 11:02pm 5/1/09 i watched a yellow orange glowing ball cross in front of my slider from south to north (curving to the east) at slightly below tree level. initially, i thought it was a small plane trying to land at pease afb, but, on reflection there are too many discrepancies:

   1) there was no sound.(windows slightly open)
   2) the plane was moving very fast and erractically.
   3) it seemed to bounce (mostly downward) fast.

i lifted my head up up to follow the path, which, if graphed, would have shown a gently sloping, gliding arc to the north, which then curved to the east towards pease afb, but: it slowed, dropped and sped up during it trajectory. i could even even see the glow behind the trees often. it's speed was variable.

i came home this afternoon and got back into bed to check the visual sightline in daylight hours and realized that it was not as far away as i originally thought, but instead smaller than a cessna single prop plane. apparently, it flew up the squamscott river, down great bay and approached pease afb from the east.

i checked to see if there were any other reports of this object in the local news, but it's low flight path, time of night and lack of population in this area, as well as it's apparent speed cuased me to be the only observer.

half asleep, it registered as odd, but, i did not get up to follow it's path through the windows at the foot of my bed, as the trees are closer and higher there.

if you would like to discuss this further, there are good google maps around my address which to re-create the flight path and apparent distance away. second floor bedroom, with an apparent 8 degrees above the horizon with a river created tree line for distance calculation may help detail this brief sighting.

i have no desire to file a police report or report this to the local news, as, even though i have interest in these things, i have no desire to be labelled. i don't drink or use any mind altering drugs or medications at any time.
content.summary: Bright orange/yellow glowing light-low level 'bouncing' & erratic flight at treetop level.

content.detailedDescription:
This is a report of a sighting i had on monday april 20 2009. 
i was on a road trip from oklahoma to california traveling on interstate 40. on sunday the 19th i left oklahoma late in the afternoon and drove to somewhere within the borders of new mexico that evening. found a small motel checked in went to sleep. the next morning i woke up, gassed up, cleaned my windows and continued on toward my destination at approx. 7am. i was still on the far eastern side of nm and was had a long day of travel ahead of me so i found what i thought was the best coffee in town and hit the road. 
i had been on the road for probably three to four hours and was getting close to the western borders of new mexico; in fact, i was at mile marker 62 or 63, just enjoying the ride and the scenery when i happened to look toward the northwest. i noticed a bright object in the direction i was looking and focused my vision on it. at first i thought it might be a hot air balloon, having just watched a documentary on them on pbs just a few days before, but the object wasn���t shaped like a balloon. the object was shaped like a dome that was slightly short of a half circle. it had a flat bottom to it that was shaped like a tear drop on its side, with the pointy end facing toward my right. i approximate that i was looking up at a 20 to 30 degree angle, through my windshield. 
there was a plane in the far distance coming toward me from the area of nw arizona that was within my field of vision as well, evidenced by the con trail it left in its wake and a large mesa off to the right that was parallel to the highway. the craft was slightly above the mesa in clear blue sky.
the object was bright metallic silver, as pure a color silver as i���ve ever seen. there were no other distinguishing marks other than the bottom which appeared white and which for the briefest of moment seemed to phase out of distinct characteristic form and then back in. 
i had been looking at the object for a matter of probably six seconds and had to turn my attention back to the road to make sure i was still traveling in my lane. convinced i was ok i looked back to where the object had been and it was gone��� completely.
within a couple miles of the sighting was an exit off the highway. i took it and got out of my car to investigate further. i couldn���t see anything but several airplanes with the con trails left in their wake. 
i later exited at another off ramp to ask if there was any historical significance to the area and i found out that right there was the entrance to chaco canyon, the residence of the now extinct anastasi indians. i thought that was interesting
content.summary: Sighted object near chaco canyon, new mexico.

content.detailedDescription:
As i was walking my dog at the cliff castle casino south parking lot in camp verde, arizona, when i noticed a bright light in the western sky just above the mountains.

i had just gotten out of the car which was facing the west and there it was, so bright, you couldn't miss it.

at first i thought it was probably a small plane (there's a private airstrip right there by the casino, and another airport nearby in cottonwood).  however, the lights were flashing rapidly, not in the pattern of strobes.

then i thought it might be a helicopter because it seemed to be maintaining the same position in the sky but as far as i know helicopter lights don't flash different colors, so i ruled that out.

the lights were flashing rapidly, turning from bright blue to white and occasionally red, and back again.  i couldn't make out an exact shape but once in a while a white beam of light would flash under the object and then disappear.

it remained in the same place the entire time i watched it.

i felt thrilled to see it, at the same time very calm, and as i left to go into the casino, a great sense of peace. i looked back just before going in, and it was still there.

submitted: may 2, 2009 gail berry, sedona, az
content.summary: Flashing bright lights/stationary.

content.detailedDescription: It was three a.M. and attached to my room is a balcony which faces due west. i walked out on my balcony to urinate and due west just above the treeline i saw a very bright orange light hovering. it hovered for approximately 5 minutes and then slowly went below the treeline in the distance where i could no longer see it. before disappearing it was dead still and very bright no flickering or pulsing or anything. i found this very interesting as i am a believer and wish the government would stop lying about many things to us.
content.summary: Bright orange light hovering then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: Was outside the house smoking and looking at the stars when i seen an object that looked like a bright star that was a little bit higher than a commercial jet flys and moving about 5times as fast.. it was following a long stretch of clouds and went acrossed the sky until it was out of sight.  no noise and was waaay faster than anything ive ever seen flying in the sky.
content.summary: Bright light, 5x as fast as a commercial jet and a little higher in elevation travelling across the sky above the clouds.
content.locationName: Canyon Lake and Lake Elsi, California

content.detailedDescription:
I had just came home from work ,parked infront of

my house,opened my vehicle door, then heard what--

i'm really not sure what it was.  it sort of sounded

like a blimp-with a wriling sound-not real loud but

loud enough,i felt a vibration.  at first i was wondering if this

is what an earthquake felt like but then i thought-you can't hear 

an earth quake.  by the time i got to my front door,i just stood there for

about 5 minutes and listened, never saw anything but it sounded real close
 
i looked behind me,briefly,but still didn't see anything.  what worries me is,there a power plant visible from the end of the main drag.  i then went in my house as i then kind of put 2&2 together as to what i thought i just witnessed.  when i saw the article in our local newspaper this week,i thought i would pass out.  god only knows what would have happened to me if i had actually seen it.  the sound i heard sounded very close-like it was right above rooftop
content.summary: On ground heard low hum-sort of like a blimp or a transformer-felt mild vibration.

content.detailedDescription: It stoped over my head i could not see any stars in the shape of a triangle it was so close i could throw a rock at it and not a sound came from it then it was gone i think but i did not even remeber that much for maby 2 years or so later when i was watching a ufo show on tv and they showed a black triangle pic then it came back to me what had took place back then it was so strange thet i must have had my memory cleared or somthing and by seeing it on tv it trigered my memory
content.summary: Large black triangle, blocked out stars.

content.detailedDescription:
Durante el mes de noviembre de 2005 yo organizaba la feria del pino navide���o y fui a la sierra madre de santiago a ver los viveros de pinos navide���os,tome muchas fotos de los arbolitos y de las monta���as,no fue hasta un a���o despues cuando envie una de esas fotos a una amiga para mostrarle la belleza de nuestras sierras,cuando esa persona me dijo que revisara la foto que ahi aparecia algo inusual.Fue cuando me sorprendi al ver claramente que no era un parajaro ni un avion ni una estrella sino algo que jamas habia visto.
las fotos son digitales y sin retoques,ustedes lo pueden comprobar,creo que realmente es un objeto no convencional el que aparece en esta imagen.Les envio solo una y si les interesa les enviare las demas.

ha sido un placer saber de ustedes.
content.summary: Unknown

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were sitting on my balcony when i noticed a strange bright orange light moving slowly in the southwestern sky. i brought out my telescope to investigate. i was able to look at it through my telescope for a few seconds at a time before it would pass out of view. it appeared to be a perfect spherical structure with some sort of legs. i don't think it was giving off any light, instead i think it's glow was reflected light from the sun, so it must have been very high up as the sun had already set a while beforehand. it followed an odd path about the southwestern sky, sometimes moving faster than others, before it faded away. it was soon replaced by another closer one (or perhaps the same one?) which moved in a similar manner through the sky and was soon joined by another. after a few minutes they both faded. i watched for more but saw none, however, a few minutes after the last one had vanished my friend and i (and another friend who i had called to watch in case another thing appeared) saw a pair of some sort of fast moving but silent planes in that area of the sky whose lights blinked in a way unlike any planes i have previously seen.
content.summary: Three orange objects.

content.detailedDescription:
Hi, 

i regularly visit detroit michigan on business.
this week i stayed at the westin ,1114 washington blvd.

i got a room that overlooked the canada border and on wednesday night(04/29/09) , i was working at 10:30 in the night and i happened to look into the sky from my windows.

i observed this strange triangular lights  first i thought some helicopters might be flying.. but then i observed that the light on the top was stable and the lights other two lights were moving very quickly ..

i observed them for more than 20 minutes.. and then it suddenly struck me that they can take me away... so i closed the blinds.. and called by husband.. then he asked me to check if they were still there.. i found them there again and i closed the windows...
content.summary: Triangle with moving stars.

content.detailedDescription: I was laying on the couch watching the chicago bulls game and it was just into the first overtime thats why i put approximate time ibeleive it was between 9:00 and 9:30. we have a window that faces the south the blind was up and the window was open.A bright orange light just above the tree line caught my attention i watched it for about ten seconds and it dissapered ijust kept watching all of a sudden it appeared higher in the sky.That got me off the couch i went to the window and watched it was like someone shut off a light switch and it was gone.By this time i am thinking that this did not look like a plane light or a star. i then went outside and stood out there for about 10 minutes at this time my girlfreind who had been watching tv in the bedroom came to the door and asked what i was doing when i told her she laughed and said get in the house.I walked up on the deck and looked to my right there it was again i yelled debbie hurry there it is she got there in time to see it before it dissapeared when it did another one came on.We both stood there watching and then it dissapered  my girlfreind acted a little uneasy after she witnesed this and went back in the house i stayed out there about 5 more minutes but i didnt see anything more when i went in i asked her what she thought she just said probably some kind of plane i said not like any plane lights i have ever seen and not a planet they dont turn off and appear in othe parts of the sky
content.summary: Orange sphere in southern sky.

content.detailedDescription: April 27th, 2009, i was driving north on main st. in bradford, pa at around 3:30pm. it was an un-seasonably hot sunny day and the sky was a deep blue with a few sparse wispy white clouds. i looked to my left, out the driver side window and saw a very distinct symmetrical, shiny, silvery metallic object hovering motionlessly in the western sky. my first thought was that maybe it was a helicopter because it was just hovering there and not moving, although its perfect symmetry and chrome-like appearance did not make that seem likely. the only way i could describe it would be that it was shaped like an acorn or upside down bell with the wider end up. i looked later on the internet for photos of ���acorn shaped ufo���s��� and was surprised to find that they were not that uncommon. the only difference was that the pictures that i found showed the object inverted, with the wider end facing down. i continued to watch the object for about 15 or 20 seconds and then to my amazement, it just faded away into the blue sky over the course of 4 or 5 seconds. that���s when i was convinced that i had seen a ufo. weather balloons or helicopters don���t just disappear right before your eyes.
content.summary: Saw a shiny, metallic, acorn shaped object hovering against deep blue sky.

content.detailedDescription:
This morning, i wake up at 3 am and went outside of my house. i saw the light coming towards me and as object is near by me i saw aircraft was oval at bottom it has 7 or 8 bright light. i was going to take pic but as i go to my room and grab camera it will be too late.Before i thought ufo's dont exit but after i seen from my naked eyes it does exit.

below link, this is the exact airacraft i saw this morning. 
http://www.World-mysteries.Com/ufo_2.J
content.summary: I saw a ufo aircraft.

content.detailedDescription: Http://www.Pyramidcam.Com/images/april20_2009.Html
content.summary: Ufo at giza pyramids may have caused webcam to fail.

content.detailedDescription:
I was just walking my dog when i saw a shooting star. it caught my eye so i looked up into the sky to see if i could see more of them. then something else caught my eye. it was a dark mass with 3 very dark red orbs or dark areas that appeared to be orbs went over. i could not see the craft but i could see it blocking out the stars behind it. i could make out that it was a triangle shape but no detail to it other then the 3 dark reddish orbs. the object made no sound at all and it moved smooth like a disc on a table hockey board. 

i watched it fly past until it was out of site. 

i have attached a image i made of what i saw. the background is just some random pic i found on the web. the sky was/ is much darker then in the image but it represents what i am tyring to show.
content.summary: 3 dark dark red orbs and solid center.

content.detailedDescription:
I have a modified webcam with no ir filter connected to my pc and looking upward towards the sky through my office window. i keep it there all the time and watch the skies, clouds etc. using webcam application.

i was just gazing at the webcam while taking a break this evening around 7:30pm seattle time and noticed a smooth sailing triangular looking object flying by. it was flying very slow compared to the planes that usually fly by here all the time. i sit close to the window where the camera is and can hear the planes all the times. in this case it was quiet and i couldn't see anything outside through the naked eye but only through the webcam application connected to my modded camera. i hit the snapshot button twice on the application to capture the frames, got two. 

i am attaching the original picture as the camera sees it and then the enhanced one. to me it looks like a triangle of some sort. have any one of you seen something like this? is it really a triangle flying. what was unique about this is that it was quiet, smooth slow sailing, no lights as i couldn't find it in the sky but only through the cam. 

can't confirm what it is - see the pics and be the judge.
content.summary: Triangle looking - flying slowly.

content.detailedDescription:
Yeh so im a stoner pre roll joints and sit at top of a dark woods smoking pot while star gazing wat more could you do?:d

and from 2009 i have seen many white orbs floating at steady speed the first time i seen this there was 2 orbs gliding paralell from each other.Then they blinked out i have seen many of these the best 1 i seen was quite red came upwards from the horizon like it came from land  my friend said it was a flair it stopped dead then moved right i asked him how it could be a flair they dont stop dead then move another direction  this 1 didnt blink out it shot in a north direction very fast fastest thing i seen,it just pisses me of trying to get threw to these brainwashed idiots to make them believe what i seen not many people do :'[ i donni cair i cnt be the only 1 to be spotting these things its only a momant of time before they land.





~brodie
content.summary: I have seen at least 26 orb/ball things in the sky that show from nowhere and then blink out.

content.detailedDescription: It was approximately 8pm and i was walking up the back stairs of the house which faces an easterly direction over the ocean.As i got to the top of the steps i noticed a very bright blinking star which at first glance i thought it was a areoplane coming in of the sea to land at brisbane airport. it then seemed strange to me as i have lived on this island all my life and i have never seen a aeroplane come in from that direction so i stood at the top of the steps for about 10 mins and noticed that the lights were blinking brighter than a usual plane, in this time the lights did not seem to get any closer so i walked inside to put the washing down i had just got off the clothes line. i went out side again as the lights had me interested for some reason and when i went back outside the light was still in the same position so i called to my wife to bring the binoculers out so i could have a better look as this thing was about 20 to 30 km away. when i ajusted the binoculers i was stunned to see that there was like a disc shapped object with the most beautiful coloured lights that i have ever seen which comprised of a blue intermintent light flashing light on top of this thing and the middle of was bright red like a tail light of a motor car, at the bottom it was changing colours in a swirling fashion from orange to a light blue to a green sort of colour at that point i thought i was going nuts so called to my wife and adult son to come and have a look at this thing. my wife was the first out of the pair to look at it and was very supprised and started to get very worried and wanted to call someone about it as by this time it had come a little closer and had now tilted on its side at about 45 degrees at this point we knew it was not an aeroplane. my son all this time was taking the mickey out of me saying that the little green men are comeing to get me but once he looked at it through the binoculers he went real quiet and turned around and went back inside as my wife and i continued to watch. in all we watched it for about 50 minutes and started to get attacked by mossy's so we went inside to get some insect reppellant which only took about 40 to50 seconds as it was on top of the fridge near the door but when i turned around to look at it again it was gone and as it was a very clear night we could not see it any where only an aeroplane landing at brisbane airport and it was nothing like what we had just seen, thanks for listening.
content.summary: Bright disc shaped object with different coloured flashing lights. blue flashing light on top red in the middle & orangelight on bottom that changed colours as if turning around some how.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting in my conservatory and happened to look up to the sky. i saw two bright orange lights hovering in the sky, then they disappeared into the distance then one after another three more came from the same place, exactly the same thing happened they hovered and then disappeared. at that moment i range my friend and told her, then again three more, one after each other, then hovered before disappearing in to the distance. i tried several times to take a picture on my mobile, i will check the as soon as possible!
absolutely amazing! i am a convert!!
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright orange round shaped objects moved across the sky right to left and were static for a while then disappeared into the distance.

content.detailedDescription:
i had been star gazing for perhaps thirty minutes as i did frequently at that time. i lived alone about midway between deming, nm and the border with mexico. this is fairly remote desert land about 18 miles out of deming. the sky above the desert was very clear giving me excellent visibility. i saw this object on four seperate occasions over a period of about three months. three of the sightings were of short duration, one was possibly three minutes. as i was getting ready to enter my dwelling, a bright white light directly overhead caught my attention. my reflexes are very fast and i was able to look up quickly enough to catch it in mid-pulse. it appeared as a pulsating, egg-shaped light. there were no external lights or strobes, it appeared to be much like a rigid eggshell with a bright light shining within. it pulsated light on about a one or two second interval. between pulses it disappeared, reappearing a considerable distance from the previous pulsation. on this occasion it looked to be at least ten miles high and perhaps much further. i have no doubt that it was intelligent directed, it was obviously not any sort of natural object. my first thought was "man, this is weird!". i had never seen anything like it before and knew immediately that it was an ufo. whatever height it actually was, it appeared to be the same approximate length as the large passenger airliners that i saw frequently going to and from albuquerque. it was about half as wide as it was long, the taper from mid-point appeared identical both front and back. it pulsated twice in a straight line and then pulsated once at 45 degrees from the line with an identical distance between pulsations and then disappeared. the entire occurance lasted maybe five seconds. two other seperate sightings within the same three month period were only a single pulsation. the last time i saw it, it was low to the ground near the tres hermanas mountains, which were about ten miles away. at first it moved very slowly and a bit erratically. at that distance, it may have been 300' long. as it shifted  gradually toward me, it slowly dimmed from a bright white to pale yellow on thru orange and red to a dusky reddish brown reminescient of a lunar eclipse. it finally blinked out while moving slowly to the west parallel to me and disappeared. when i asked nieghbors about it, some said they had seen a similiar object before but didn't know what it was. during and after sightings i experienced an uncomfortable, somewhat elated awe. at about the same time period i observed two cold meteorites (non-glowing), one traveling horizontally at about one hundred and fifty miles per hour so close i thought i heard a swishing sound. i was living in a remote area of the desert, the closest nieghbors being about a mile away.
i have spent many years studying the ufo phenomenen and even wrote a short book on the subject (the truth, if you dare). i have had three other encounters since about 1969. after abundant research in the ufo and many relevent fields, i firmly believe that i understand what they are and why they are here, tho' i doubt that everyone would agree with me. i tried many times to shoot holes in my theories but was unable to do so, in fact, my theories began to speak to and answer questions relating to other remarkable phenomenen. i employed converging lines of evidence to reach my conclusions. i am very bright, testing in the top one percent nationally and am not a crank of any sort. thank you for allowing me to give this testimony.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Huge, internally lit, pulsating ,egg-shaped craft able to move both slowly and very fast as well as hovering

content.detailedDescription: It has been a while since this happened but i feel i should share it was some time in november or october last year '08 i was standing in my back yard watching my dog mess around when i noticed a cigar or oval shaped object come into view not very far away or high in the air it was covering quite a bit of sky then my dog a mini schnauzer stared growling at something behind our work shed she was bent like she was about to attack something i yelled "who's there" then my dog took a couple steps forward still looking angry started to back down and almost look she was in pain then i heard something move behind it again then i'm not making this up a four to four and half foot grayish green more grey than green alien ran out looked at me as it ran and went behind this huge bush we have then there was a huge gust of wind the ship was gone when i opened my eyes and i feel on my but with my mouth opened i must have just stared at nothing for hours i was so scared i went back inside and it was 2 i went out there at 1130 but it all happened in 5 mins it toke me 2 days to stop shaking i would like to remain anonymous but email me and ill talk
content.summary: A silver with red lights oval or cigar.

content.detailedDescription:
Me and some of my family members(3) were sitting outside in the front of my 
house.The house was near ca hwy 41 west of atacadero,ca in city limits.

my dad,grandad,+ brother were sitting faceing the south,over on the left side of us was pine mountain that sits about in the middle of the city of atascadero,ca.
i had just gotten a new watch and i was setting the time it was 7:05 pm 11 secs. i had looked up to say thanks to my dad for the time so i could set my watch, then in the southside of pine mountain i could see a very brite blue to green colored light.It was not dark yet so it looked odd to me,thinking it was a star i started to talk to my dad to see how his day was.Then i saw the light had moved from the #1 spot were i seen it.It was still in the same area just drop down close to the same level of the top of pine mountian.It may have been a 500 to 700 foot drop from the #1 spot to the #2 spot. seeing that it had moved i asked all my family members if they seen it move,my dad did and at that time i looked at may watch it was 7:12 pm.The light turned from the blue to green color to a red at this time it was very brite then dull going from brite to dull for about 20 mins. and then moved to the #3 spot(7:32pm) that was on the north side of pine mountian at a higher level in the sky,the color of the light was now a off purple color then when to white then blue to red and back to purple this happened at first slow then in a fast order and then slow and stoped and then was just white.The light moved to the #4 spot(7:55pm) at this spot it was just blue to purple light.Moved down #5 spot(7:59pm)the light was green and white at this time,then moved down to the #6 spot(8:01pm) the light was just white at this spot it was brite then dull then the light had started to flash very fast then the light just vanished in like a sec or two,it was (8:05pm) when it vanished.

we all thought that the odd event was over this was not the case at all.

as my dad+granddad and brother started to talk about what we had just seen
my dad said "there it is, it's back" as he pointed to pine mountian,the light was now at a new spot #7 spot(8:10pm) the light was just white not really brite or dull,i thought at first it was a star then it started to move.
the way it moved was like a leaf falling to the ground,moving to the left then to the right it did that type of movement 3 times to the left 3 times to the right.On the last turn to the right it moved to the #8 spot(8:18pm) at this spot it was a white light,then it turned into a white diamond shape.The diamond object was flashing green to blue to red to purple to yellow then white.This was fast then slow and stoped and then it was just green.

the object moved to #9 spot(8:20pm)(this is the last spot it was before it vanished for the last time,and we never seen it again.) 
at this spot the object was still a diamond shape and was a green to yellow color.I seen a small flashing red light heading at the object at first i thought it was a "baby ufo" going to the larger one then i seen it was a airplane and it started to circle the object.The object has now gone back to just a brite light green to yellow in color. the plane had made 2 circles around the light and a #2 airplane showed up and the #1 plane then headed to the north and was gone from are view.The #2 plane made at lease 4 circles on the last circle the light gotten very brite white and grew in size,and it just vanished in 1/2 a sec.It was (8:40pm) the #2 plane headed south and was gone from are view. 

after all this had happend i did't really know what it was in the sky that night,i know it was something i have never seen before or have yet seen again.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Brite blue light, looked like star, moved all over the night sky, diamond shaped, large flash of light, vanished in less then a sec.

content.detailedDescription:
First let me give you a little background on myself. i am 75 years old and hold a private pilots license. i live in an area of san jose where i can observe the landing patterns of commercial flights coming into san jose from both the north and south. the aircraft coming in from the north (seattle, portland) sometime fly very close to my home so am very familiar with their altitude and speed both day and night. although i am not as close to arriving aircraft coming in from the south (about 5 miles)i am also familiar with their appearance. aircraft departing from san jose to the south make a 180 degree turn to the right before continuing south. aircraft departing to the north (seattle, portland) have to make a 360 degree turn to the right in order to gain enough altitude before crossing over the san francisco area and pass almost directly over my home. i believe at least 10,000 feet. although my hearing has suffered over the years i am able to hear these aircraft very easily. 

last night at approximately 11:20 pm i stepped out on my deck for a smoke and observed a very bright light to the east about 1/3 of the distance between myself and the landing pattern of the flights arriving from the south. it was traveling in a straight line to the ssw at what appeared to be 1000-2000 feet at a speed of between 350-450 knots. if it were higher it would have to have been traveling much faster. there were no flashing red lights or strobes in evidence and made no sound whatsoever. it was completely silent. the observation lasted approximately 20-25 seconds before disappearing to the south. i consider myself an objective person and not prone to jumping to conclusions but i have never observed anything like this before in this area. i have lived at this location for about 5 years.
content.summary: Bright light traveling to the ssw @ approx 2000 ft.

content.detailedDescription:
The object was dark in color,had 3 red pulsating,not flashing lights at the bottom.One at the end of each wing and one in the center of the main front part.No sound at all.
   


   my son,his friend and i were heading to south end road market/gas station when we saw a red blur fly over our yukon,the sun roof was open so we saw it good.I got on the gas and rounded a bend in the road and observed it up ahead over a big steel power line carrier and a field.
 i stoped my truck and got out to see if it was a conventianal craft,i.E engine noise etc..But there was nothing.Just 3 red lights that stoped pulsating as it sat there. my sons friend had a cell phone so i told him to get the camera on and give it to me,he did but as i pointed the phone toward the object shaped as a giant v the phone went black.I hollerd and cursed because i thought he had handed it to me off,but he said he turned the camera on himself..So..I got back in my truck and just as i did that it turned 180 deg. and zoomed off the direction it came,and kinda shuffled to the left.  all 3 of us saw this thing.It was about 150 feet or so across and hooverd about 500-700 feet of the ground.So we saw it pretty good. no way man made that thing with the technology we have now!
   i reported it to the local clown house a.K.A police dept. and they said it was probably someones private craft!!How funny!!!
content.summary: Flying v.

content.detailedDescription:
Ther i was sitting on the front porch (it was too hot to work) i was just picking ticks off off my coon doug blu when i saw it. it was over the old barn just a spinning and whirllen all silvery and shiniey but not like chrome different). 


i would feel alot better about mufon if you would just assign someone as a moniter to keep the nuts from being able to post any little fairy tale on this list.
content.summary: Above the barn

content.detailedDescription: I observed a hovering silver-metallic like object that hovered for about 40 minutes.  i watched if for a very long time, as it was stationary, silent, and had now wings, rotors, tail fins, or any thing else modern aircraft use for stability.  i ran into my house to get binoculars after watching for this long, when i returned, it was gone.  even with my time in the military, i have not seen any thing like this in my life. since i was still in school at this point in my life, i asked my friend if he seen something strange in the sky, he told me that he had.  we wrote down what the object looked like on separate pieces of paper.  our descriptions were early describing the same thing.
content.summary: Hovering silver hotdog.

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i were standing on the back patio star gazing as we do every nice night when a large flash caught my eye it was very bright, almost as a camera flash would be, and as i looked in that direction it flashed again and was traveling as fast as a free falling object would.
i seen a total of 3 flashes before it fell behind the trees. there was no sound at all with this movement and i was unable to tell the distance.
it was so weird to see that, so my husband and i moved out to the back yard and looked up for a plane to see if maybe by chance this was a flare drop, no plane was in sight. next thing we see a "moving star" as we watch that, another "moving star" comes out of no where and is moving in the opposite direction and both are in view, however 2nd "moving star" disappears within approx.10 secs and the 1st "moving star" keep moving and slowly moved out of sight. we are both well aware of planes as we see a dozen a night. these "moving stars" are seen about 1-2 nights a week between the hours of 9:30pm up to 11:30pm and on average 2-3 a night all with 30 minutes of each other. two nights ago we seen 4 total and a "flasher". one was moving very fast, faster than any jet we'd ever seen during the day. and one was very bright then just vanished as if the lights were turned off.
content.summary: Unusual lights.
